uml.gen.activeModel.description: For what model should the docs be generated

uml.gen.excludeFiles.description: Provide a comma-separated list of strings. If the file path includes ANY of the strings, the file will be excluded for generation.

uml.gen.allowedExtensions.description: Provide a comma-separated list of extensions. If the extension is in this list, the file will be generated.

uml.gen.dataTypes.description: Provide a comma-separated list of primitive data types. If the data type is in this list, it will not try to find the UML element.
